displayProperties.description:
You've extracted a number of keywords from your surveillance transcript that suggest, perhaps, the Drifter has planted explosives somewhereâ€”but the Drifter's Gambit takes place throughout the solar system. They could be anywhere. You resolve to head up to the Derelict to begin your investigation. Maybe there's a clue there somewhere.

Enter the activity "Mystery and Potential" via the Gambit Director and search the Derelict for some kind of clue.
displayProperties.name: Bomb Threat
